resources.string:
This is the main screen
 This is the first screen the user sees when they start the app
 This screen shows what mixtapes (playlists) are available to them
 From here the user can either create a new mixtape,
 or play a mixtape created by themselves or a friend
 The technical hurdles will be to share mixtapes amoung friends.
 This would require all data to be in a cloud database.

The screen is for creating new mixtapes
 Each mixtape is a series of music tracks
 This screen will start looking empty
 Ths user needs to add tracks
 After the track is added, this view will show the
 song name, artist name, album name, a button to preview the song
 A link to share the mixtape with a friend or group of friends. 
 This screen will keep a running total of time, let the user order the tracks
 From here the user can press the Add Track button
 and go to the search screen to find tracks to add.

The search tracks screen is for searching for tracks to add.
 Technical hurldes would be a way to sort cloud based music
 A search bar to find Artists, genres, similar music etc.
 A list of available tracks would be below the search bar.

Now playing will show the cover art on top with controls such as play\pause\next track
 Below the control buttons will be the track list that will link
 to a page that will give more information about the artist, 
 as well as give suggestions for similar tracks.
 I don't know all the technical hurles,
 but I think owning the license to the music would be one.

This view gives a user information about
 the song/album/artist etc.
 Then show the user similar songs/artists that are available.
 The tecnical challeges here would be to get the information from some library.
